summary: At the edge of the Yangtze River, not far from the Three Gorges Dam, young men and women take up employment on a cruise ship, where they confront rising waters and a radically changing China.
cast: Jerry Bo Yu Chen|Campbell Ping He|Cindy Shui Yu
keywords: china|three gorges dam|hydroelectric dam|cruise ship|yangtze river
title: Up the Yangtze
